name: airBaltic Bombardier CS300 Inaugural Flight Vlog! | inflight Video
description:
I was lucky to be invited to Riga to take part in the first flight of the Bombardier CS300!  This is the vlog from the entire day, with guest Sunil aka WindowSeat (https://www.youtube.com/user/WindowSeatVideo )

Subscribe for weekly full flight videos! http://inflightvideo.tv/subscribe
Facebook: facebook.com/inflightvideo
Twitter: twitter.com/inflightvideo
Instagram: instagram.com/inflightvideo

Check out Crazy Day Tripper for vlogs from around the world! http://www.facebook.com/crazydaytripper
